descriptionText: Tiller (Helm v2) must not be deployed because it is deprecated and no longer supported. This rule detects resources that reference Tiller by resource name or labels (for example, `metadata.name`, `metadata.labels.app == "helm"`, or a `metadata.labels.name` containing "tiller"). It also detects Tiller container images by name in `containers` or `initContainers`, including within pod templates (`spec.template`).
